subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: City defeated third-place Tottenham Hotspur, 3-2, with a penalty winner in the fourth and final minute of added time by Mario Balotelli, who was lucky not to have received a red card.
snippet: City defeated third-place Tottenham Hotspur, 3-2, with a penalty winner in the fourth and final minute of added time by Mario Balotelli, who was lucky not to have received a red card.
